resources.string: Help make LibreMobileOS better by opting into anonymous statistics reporting
Allow installation metrics and device statistics to be collected

Opting into LibreMobileOS Statistics will allow non-personal data to be submitted to the developers of LibreMobileOS to track unique installations across devices. The information submitted includes an unique identifier, which does not compromise your privacy or personal data. The data is submitted during each boot.\n\nFor an example of the data that is submitted, see in Preview Data.
